constituent: sunshine, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, piggy bank, sun, day, piglets
heisigStory: Different from the primitive for sun (which figures in the character) and the kanji for ray (Frame 125), the key word sunshine is meant to convey the meaning of the masculine principle in nature, or "Yang." (The dark is viewed mythically as the feminine principle; see frame 1718.) From there it comes to mean sun also. The elements are: pinnacle . . . piggy bank.
koohiiStory1: A kid is perched on a pinnacle with his piggy bank. He uses the coins to catch the sunshine, and redirect it into people´s eyes, far below.
koohiiStory2: The Pinnacle is environmentally friendly. They collect solar power through sunshine on their piggybank shaped solar arrays.
